name: Merar
tag_list: investment-network, emerging-markets, china, india, cee, africa
overview:
Merar is a global M&A platform, designed around the needs of the advisors, entrepreneurs and investors. The network supports entrepreneurs from India, China, Brasil, Africa, Central, and Eastern Europe, and of course all other developing regions with the necessary platform to connect with investors worldwide.

Project owner can be a startup or established business in search for funds or partners. After submitting the project on the network it gets checked and validated. Once this stage is completed the project goes public on the Merar website and interested investors can establish contact with the owner.

Merar provides anti-scam and anti-fraud protection and customisable email notifications for newly arrived opportunities matching your investment preferences.
